targets.expr:
sum( rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{exported_namespace=~"$namespace", exported_service=~"$service" , status=~"2.+" }[1m])  ) by ( ingress)
 / on (ingress )
 sum( rate( nginx_ingress_controller_requests{exported_namespace=~"$namespace", exported_service=~"$service" } [1m] )) by ( ingress) * 100

sum( rate(nginx_ingress_controller_requests{exported_namespace=~"$namespace", exported_service=~"$service" , status!~"2.+" }[1m])  ) by ( ingress)
 / on (ingress )
 sum( rate( nginx_ingress_controller_requests{exported_namespace=~"$namespace", exported_service=~"$service" } [1m] )) by ( ingress) * 100

panels.description: Only containers with resource limits set are displayed.
panels.title: HTTP 4xx Error

targets.expr:
sum( 
  (count(nginx_ingress_controller_config_hash ) by( pod) ) 
* on(pod) group_left() 
  sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{container!~"POD|"}[5m])) by (pod) 
)

(
  (count(nginx_ingress_controller_config_hash ) by( pod) ) 
* on(pod) group_left() 
  sum(rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{container!~"POD|" }[5m])) by (pod) 
) or vector(0)

sum( 
  (count(nginx_ingress_controller_config_hash ) by( pod) ) 
* on(pod) group_left() 
  sum( container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!~"POD|" }  ) by (pod) 
)

(count(nginx_ingress_controller_config_hash ) by( pod) ) 
* on(pod) group_left() 
  sum( container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!~"POD|" }  ) by (pod)

sum(
  (count(nginx_ingress_controller_config_hash ) by( pod) ) 
* on(pod) group_left() 
   sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{  interface=~"et.+"}[5m])) by(pod)
)

sum(
    (count(nginx_ingress_controller_config_hash ) by( pod) ) 
* on(pod) group_left() 
   sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{  interface=~"et.+"}[5m])) by(pod)
)

(count(nginx_ingress_controller_config_hash ) by( pod) ) 
* on(pod) group_left() 
   sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{  interface=~"et.+"}[5m])) by(pod)

(count(nginx_ingress_controller_config_hash ) by( pod) ) 
* on(pod) group_left() 
   sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{  interface=~"et.+"}[5m])) by(pod)
